actions.text: On agreeing to the Stewart amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Stewart.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stewart amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security, in collaboration wit h the Director of National Intelligence, Chairman of the Federal Communications Commission, and appropriate private entities to undertake an effort to remove or neutralize unauthorized IMSI catchers installed by foreign entities or that have an unknown attribution.
purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security, in collaboration wit h the Director of National Intelligence, Chairman of the Federal Communications Commission, and appropriate private entities to undertake an effort to remove or neutralize unauthorized IMSI catchers installed by foreign entities or that have an unknown attribution.
